next.title: What is some good career advice for members of Gen Z, as they enter the working world? Answer by @RobKingyens, Founder & CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/W7rMsQu8Be

localize.full_text: Z世代が社会人になるにあたって、キャリアに関するアドバイスはありますか？回答者： @RobKingyens, Founder & CEO at https://t.co/FmvM87k26i. https://t.co/l1X7tMGCQe https://t.co/W7rMsQu8Be
